OnBoardsystemofSCMTRailway forSoftwareIntegration Client:-Alstom Company ?Validationoftechnicaldocumentation(Requirementsspecification, SoftwareArchitectureand DetailDesigndocuments, SafetyConcepts, TechnicalsafetyReports, TestSpecificationsand Reports, User manuals). ?SoftwareVerification, ValidationandTestingofasoftwareproduct. Analysisandexecutionofsystemtests. Checkingcompliancewiththerelevantstandards.(CENELECEN:50128-2011). PerformedbyFunctionalTesting. Test strategy, test system integration, and plan definition, write or review test specification, lead test execution, review and approve test reports. To formalize anomalies if any, to organize review to analyze anomalies and to request modifications if required. ?To carryout regression tests after anomalies correction. TestIntegrationPerformedinRTRTTool. ProgramminginADALanguage.
Master's Degree Thesis Title is Software Integration Test for Railway Control Systems.
Development of GATEWAYTB HTTP SERVER PROTOCOL for 2nd GENERATION RADIO BLOCK CENTRE (RBC2G) ON C#. Client:-RFI Company (Protocol and related document is Ansaldo STS Company) 1. ThenetworkprotocolusedbytheGatewayTBapplication(fromversion2.5.0.0)toexchange information with external applications about the simulated trains and the state of the line. 2. The HTTP protocol is a request/response protocol. Once the TCP/IP connection is established, a client application sends a request to the server application (GatewayTB) a then waits for the response. In the request message, the client, accordingly to the HTTP protocol, sends the HTTP version it can manage; the behavior of the server depends on such version: if the client requested HTTP 1.0 then the server, as soon as it has sent the response, closes the connection; if the client requested HTTP 1.1, the server, after sending the response, waits for a new request on the same connection until a configured timeout (since the last request) elapses or the client itself closes the connection. 3.: thefirstpartis in HTML format allowing any internet browser to show the data; the second part is in XML format and can be easily parsed by a personalized client application. C# libraries to build parser. 4. #Programming language in class library by using Visual Studio 2017.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 60% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: SQL Developer
PositionHistory.Description: 1. The job role is SQL developer providing raw data for analysis purposes to the sales and marketing team of the company. 2. Responsible for designing advanced SQL queries, procedure, cursor, triggers, batch files. 3. PL-SQL (Triggers & Procedures) is written for updating the data into the database to update the reporting purpose tables. 4. Updating prices, tax structure into the database on request for the sales operation team.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 46% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: WordPress Developer (Freelancer)
PositionHistory.Description: Collaborate with design and Front end and Back end programming teams to concept, build, test and launch dynamic websites per industry best practices. Work closely with other web developers to ensure the client's marketing goals and objectives are being understood and met within established timelines and with the highest level of quality. Expert with WordPress CMS. Working in an E-Commerce Agile environment. Coding in a WordPress environment and develop and/or update code for themes and plugins. Modify existing code as needed. Coding of custom WordPress theme and template files using HTML, CSS.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 56% of this job

Degree.Comments: PG: MS/M.Sc(Science) (Telecommunication Engineering) from University of Bologna in 2018
UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Electronics/Telecommunication) from Institution of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineers, New delhi in 2014
